section.p: The following prerequisites are required to use Flow Automation:
section.title: Required User Roles
section.p:
You must have one of the following roles:
Flowautomation_Operator
This allows you to start new flow instances and view flow instances and instance details.
Flowautomation_Administrator
This allows you to import new flows, enable or disable flows, start new flow instances and view flow instances and instance details.
Note: Refer to the User Management Online Help for details on how to create a user/role and to set a password.
